# learn-skill

> learn-skill scaffolds the `/learn-skill` command for OpenCode, Cursor, and Claude Code so teams can generate agent skills as local, editable Markdown files in their own repositories.

This site documents how to install the CLI, generate skills from topics, review generated instructions locally, and version them in git.

## Core

- [Homepage](https://learn-skill.sh/): Product overview, install command, workflow, and core value points.
- [Install via npx](https://learn-skill.sh/): Run `npx learn-skill@latest` to scaffold the command quickly.

## Links

- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/onnokh/learn-skill): Source code, issues, and contribution history.
- [npm package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/learn-skill): Published package metadata, versions, and install details.

## Optional

- [Support the project](https://buymeacoffee.com/onnokh1i): Optional donation link for users who want to support maintenance.
